Beginner-friendly weekly challenge that aims to help you learn, practice and improve your development skills

Each week I write a tutorial on medium explaining in detail how you could possibly solve the challenge

Why You Should Join?

  • It's FREE
  • Try out new ways of approaching your code
  • Add projects to your code pen or portfolio
  • Do it on your own
  • You can follow the Tutorial if you feel stuck

How to join?

- Create a project on

Codepen

- Do it your way or teak it a bit by following the tutorial


- Share your creation by tagging @dailybitsofcode #weeklyCreationChallenge on instagram
